title: Australians remember
creator_credit: Motion Picture Associates, Australian War Memorial, Film Australia, Peter Johnson and Robert Walker
brief_description: Depicts Australia’s role in the two World Wars plus the Korean and Vietnam Wars through original film footage and exhibitions from the Australian War Memorial, Canberra.
creator_credit_for_label: Motion Picture Associates, Australian War Memorial, Film Australia, Peter Johnson and Robert Walker
